data.scheme_name: Integrated and Sustainable Textile Policy 2023-28 - Handloom Sector - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 30% price subsidy on cotton hank yarn, domestic silk, woolen and linen yarn and blended yarn of natural fibers.
data.eligibility: The incentives under this scheme will be given to  handloom weavers across the country.
data.conditions: Price subsidy will be available with quantity restriction.
data.beneficiaries: The incentives under this scheme will be given to  handloom weavers across the country.
data.prerequisites: Price subsidy will be available with quantity restriction.
data.context: The policy envisions integrating the whole textile value chain and create an enabling environment for sustained growth of all sub-sectors in the industry.
data.objective: The objective of this scheme is to strengthen the sector and encourage units in various parts of the State.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides 30% price subsidy on on cotton hank yarn, domestic silk, woolen and linen yarn and blended yarn of natural fibers. 
  2. Handloom weaver households will be provided free electricity up to 200 units per month.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the Maharashtra Textile Department : https://etextile.maharashtra.gov.in/registration
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate 
GST Certificate 
Financials for Last 2 years 
Projected financial data 
Lending Bank Details 
Basic KYC Documents
Detailed Project Report (DPR)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Government of Maharashtra, Co-operation, Marketing and Textile Department, Mantralaya, Mumbai 400032
Email : textilepolicy-mah[At]gov[Dot]in
Phone No..: 022-22026805
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Textile Industry - All Entities - Maharashtra - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
